channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House votes for Justice Department to release Epstein files

item.title: House rebukes Rep. Garcia for 'undermining' election process with delayed retirement move

item.title: Nicki Minaj joins U.N. Ambassador Mike Waltz to spotlight the killings of Christians in Nigeria
item.description: U.S. Ambassador to the U.N. Mike Waltz and rapper Nicki Minaj have joined forces to condemn Christian persecution in Nigeria.

item.title: Lindsey Halligan’s Botched Grand Jury Presentation Against Comey
item.description: Some errors may require dismissal of the charges. Some are being exaggerated.

item.title: ‘No More Delays’: GOP Senators Demand D.C. Circuit Chief Suspend Boasberg Amid Impeachment Efforts
item.description: 'No more delays. Judge Boasberg must be suspended immediately,' Sen. Eric Schmitt, R-Mo., wrote.

item.title: Why Christians Should Build Cathedrals
item.description: There is nothing vainglorious about giving glory to God with the best works of our minds and our hands.

item.title: The Epstein Conspiracy in Plain Sight
item.description: An element of the American elite embraced Epstein as one of its own, even after his guilty plea, thanks to his wealth and his connections.

item.title: No, The Conservative Answer To America’s Affordability Crisis Isn’t Just To ‘Move’
item.description: 'Conservatism,' as a political ideology, has failed to conserve anything meaningful, and that's a serious problem.

item.title: On the Ground in Dnipro, Ukraine, as the Russians Advance
item.description: The Russians are mercilessly pounding this city of more than a million.
